it.polimi.se2018.networking.client

Class RmiNetworkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.networking.client.RmiNetworkHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerNetInterface

    public class RmiNetworkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerNetInterface
    The network handler: it simulates the sever on the client.

    It behaves similarly to an adapter, to connect the ClientNetInterface to the ServerNetInterface, when the connection is with RMI.

    Author:
    michelemarzollo

      • addClient

        public boolean addClient(ClientNetInterface client,
                         boolean isMultiPlayer)
        The method to add a client to the server.

        It creates the Skeleton of the client, to interact with the Stub of the server, and passes the remote reference of the client to the server.

        It also starts a timer that pings the server to detect if the connection is down.

        Specified by:
        addClient in interface ServerNetInterface
        Parameters:
        client - the client to connect.
        isMultiPlayer - true if the client is playing in multi player mode; false if it's playing in single player mode.
        Returns:
        true if the client had been added; false otherwise.

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(ClientNetInterface client)
        The method to remove a client form the server.
        Specified by:
        removeClient in interface ServerNetInterface
        Parameters:
        client - the client to remove.
